version_description: - Optimized for the iPhone X

- Customer experience improvements
- Video Player updates
- In-App Billing improvements
- Updated language support
- Bug fix to address infrequent app crashes
- Additional In-App Billing improvements

New Feature! Continue Watching
• Now you can stop watching a movie or show in the middle and continue later from the same point. Even from another device. This works for on-demand programs and your Cloud DVR recordings.

Squashed Bug! Anti-social Social Login
• We unfriended the bug that made connecting/logging in with Facebook a hassle.

Every fuboTV update makes the app faster and more reliable than ever. For the best live sports experience, turn on Automatic Downloads.

We’re sneaking in a quick year-end update to make sure you’re set for the start of the new year.

• Sections dedicated to specific series now include Live and Upcoming content
• fuboTV and Apple’s billing systems now high-five like only billing systems can
• Older devices now have a better streaming experience

Lou Gehrig. Bobby Orr. Brett Favre. Wearing #4 comes with a lot of responsibility. And fuboTV 4.0 is ready to carry that weight.

Now you can find your games faster and watch more of what you love — anytime, anywhere.

New features in 4.0:

* Start Over — Missed the coin toss? Start Over saves the day. One tap sends you back to the beginning of what you're watching. Don't miss a second.

* Lookback for Sports — Weren't able to catch the game and forgot to hit record? No problem. You can replay nearly any game that aired in the last 3 days with 72-hour Lookback.

* My Fubo — A new place to manage what you watch. Stream and schedule Cloud DVR recordings, and continue watching what you didn't finish.

* Upgraded Guide — Find what you watch even faster. Browse the guide for what's live. Browse by network to see what's on demand.

* New Threads — 4.0 is a whole new ballgame. So we dressed it up in a slick new uniform. Now it shares team colors with the rest of the fuboTV apps.
